DOC.brief_summary: The Jetstream System is a commercially available rotating, aspirating, expandable catheter designed to remove atherosclerotic plaque and blood clots in the lower limbs. The purpose of this study is to use intravascular ultrasound (IVUS) during the interventional procedure to measure the amount of plaque and blood clots removed by the Jetstream System.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Collect Intravascular Ultrasound Images Before and After Treatment With the Jetstream System
